description:
Team Magma is one of the villainous teams to be found in Hoenn. Team Magma`s goal is to raise and expand the landmasses of the world with the power of Groudon. The leader of Team Magma is Maxie. Their uniforms are a black shirt, black short pants for the men and black skirt for the women, with a short red jacket.
Team Magma appears several times, searching for clues on the ancient Pokémon Groudon. Their leader, Maxie, never even touches a Poké Ball, much less controls Groudon. While returning to base in a submarine, they accidentally pick up Ash and company, who are discovered by Maxie. In the anime, Team Magma functions as a complete organization, and respect is always shown.
There are many grunts and an admin, Tabitha. Brodie`s status is unknown; he may be an admin or a very experienced grunt. Butler from "Jirachi: Wish Maker" worked as a scientist for the organization at a time prior to the movie, but after failing to create a Groudon from a fossilized remnant of another, he was fired.
Their Pokémon usually include Houndoom and Mightyena. Brodie`s team includes a Ditto.
